comment.author: 69662531@N05

comment._content: William Henry Gregg was Commissioned from Officer Cadet (and ex-OTC Cadet) to Second Lieutenant with effect 22nd May 1915.  His initial posting to the 5th (Extra Reserve) Battalion and Depot Royal Irish Rifles at Holywood, Belfast, is also published in the London Gazette of 21st May 1915.
